name: Human 2 Human
description: H2H was founded in Gurgaon India, in 2017 with the deep passion to help businesses do ‘the people stuff’ better. It is a consulting firm made up of I-O Psychologists who have practical business experience. The founders started their career in assessment, studied and researched the science of human behaviour in context to work place excellence and has helped some of the top brands in India to build a competitive advantage through their human capital. With over 2 decades of experience, H2H is set up by highly experienced team of Business Psychologists providing leadership solutions using globally recognized tools. We work hand-in-hand with business leaders, executives, and human resource leaders to consult and deliver people management services. H2H helps individuals and organizations by identifying and developing their unique strengths while addressing limitations
Headline: CREATING SYNERGIES TO ENABLE - TRANSFORM – EXCEL
ShortDescription: H2H is founded with a sole purpose of enabling businesses to use their people potential to thrive in a dynamic and competitive environment.

Highlights.name: Analytics
Highlights.description: Employee assessments & talent analytic tools to help you hire smarter employees, develop their talent & drive results by connecting individual competencies to organizational performance. Our assessments span all positions from entry level through to the C-Suite. Discover why we are the trusted partner globally.

Highlights.name: Coaching
Highlights.description: Most executives need practical on-the-job coaching rather than more intellectual leadership training. Our Coaching service quickly identifies tipping point behaviors and leverages a clear process enabling leadership growth to become embedded in day-to-day interactions

Highlights.name: Counselling
Highlights.description: Our professional counselors help clients identify goals and potential solutions to their problems and help them improve communication, coping skills, strengthen self-esteem, and promote behavior change.

enhanced_description: Human 2 Human (H2H) is an HR consulting firm established in Gurgaon, India, in 2017. Comprised of experienced I-O Psychologists and Business Psychologists with over two decades of practical business experience, H2H specializes in people management services. They leverage globally recognized tools and talent analytics to help businesses optimize their human capital, improve employee engagement and happiness, and achieve a competitive advantage. Their services include comprehensive pre-employment and employee assessments, cognitive ability tests, and 360-degree surveys. H2H also provides executive coaching, focusing on practical, on-the-job behavioral changes, and professional counselling to enhance communication, coping skills, and self-esteem. They aim to enable businesses to utilize their full people potential and thrive in dynamic environments by identifying and developing individual strengths while addressing limitations.
key_use_cases: Performance Measurement and Improvement (through assessments and analytics)
competitive_advantages: Deep expertise from I-O Psychologists and Business Psychologists with practical business experience
Over two decades of collective experience in human behavior and workplace excellence
Use of globally recognized tools for leadership solutions and assessments
Focus on practical, on-the-job executive coaching for behavioral change
Trusted partner globally for employee assessments and talent analytics
implementation_scenarios: Direct consulting engagement with business leaders, executives, and HR leaders to deliver tailored people management services.
roi_benefits: Enhanced competitive advantage through optimized human capital
More effective talent development and leadership growth
Improved organizational performance by connecting individual competencies to business results
Enhanced communication, coping skills, and self-esteem among employees
Maximized utilization of people potential within the organization
scalability_features: Services cater to all positions from entry-level to C-Suite
Capable of serving Small, Large, and Global Enterprises
